title: Rescue the Tieflings
content:
tives

Find out where the tieflings are being held in Moonrise Towers.

We learned from Alfira that some of the tieflings were taken to Moonrise Towers. She's asked us to save them. Rolan's brother and sister were among the tiefling kidnapped by the ciltists. He hasn't taken it well.

Break the tieflings out of captivity.

We found the captured tieflings. They won't last long in Moonrise Towers. We should find a way to help them escape.

Speak to the gnomes.

The gnomes have a plan to break out
